summary: A young woman in rural 1950s England becomes involved in a scandalous love triangle that will inevitably leave someone behind to suffer the consequences.
cast: Rupert Graves|Samantha Morton|Nicholas Woodeson|Lee Ross|Felix Billson|Lauren Richardson|Frank Finlay|Vernon Dobtcheff|Miriam Margolyes|Holly Aird|Frederick Stuart|Richie Tongé|Harry Selby|Juan Thomas|Emma Cunniffe|Siân James|Dyfan Jones|Doug Davidson|Terry Quayle|Don Elliott|Jim Caine|Peter Gardiner|Ken Ingham|Anthony Hannan|Margaret John|Julian Simmonds
keywords: male female relationship|unrequited love|sister sister relationship|lust|love triangle
title: El sueño de Joseph Lees
